artist: Lithographer: Gustav Wolff; Artist: After Ferdinand Bol
description: Virgin seated on rock in a landscape holding child Jesus; Joseph seated above and behind; donkey head and neck visible at right; household goods scattered around
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Gemalt von Ferd. Boll   Lithogr. Von G. Wolff/ DIE FLUCHR DER HEIL. FAMILIE NACH EGYPTEN/ (Dresdener Galerie)/ 89]; on sheet in pencil: [1-146]
title: Die Flucht der Heil Famlie nach Egypten
